reviewText: If you're a fan of Tornatore (like me) you know he's all about nostalgia, but this film is some how different, I don't want to give the plot away since I truly enjoy it and didn't knew anything about it when I load it on the DVD player. What I can tell you is that is one of his best films, this means a lot when we're talking about a director of "Malena", "Cinema Paradiso" and many other great movies...
